channel.title: Whonix Gateway stuck on upgrading
channel.description: Whonix Gateway 14 is stuck after running `sudo apt-get dist-upgrade`. I restarted couple of times the virtual machine and then run `sudo dpkg -configure -a` and then it show `Setting up linux-image-4.9.0.8-amd64` and that's it. I waited more than one hour but no change. How to fix this?

item.title: Whonix Gateway stuck on upgrading
item.dc:creator: Simon707
item.description:
I increased the RAM from 256 to 1024 and the upgrade worked this time. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Gateway stuck on upgrading
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Could you try please to increase VM RAM?

Read full topic
